attributes.action: Repeal Mandatory Folic Acid Fortification in UK Bread Flour
attributes.additional_details: Synthetic folic acid can accumulate as unmetabolised folic acid, with concerns including masking vitamin B12 deficiency, potential cancer progression in some groups, and side effects such as headaches, anxiety, sleep and digestive issues. Genetic variants like MTHFR may impair metabolism, increasing risk. Mandatory fortification removes choice despite uneven benefit.
attributes.background: We call on Parliament to repeal mandatory folic acid fortification of UK bread flour, protect consumer choice, respect informed consent, and replace mass medication with targeted education and voluntary supplementation for those who need it most.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ensure access to non-whole meal flour without folic acid fortification
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751401
